item.title: Zack Samuels named ABC7 Athlete of the Month for August
item.description: This young man continues to persevere and strive in the game that he loves, despite serious injuries that have tried to stop him.

item.title: Discovering the Flushings of the Suncoast the Suncoast
item.description: You flush. And then what happens? Especially in an area at sea level?

item.title: No swimming signs posted on Bean Point after multiple drownings
item.description: In the past month, there have been three drownings on and near Bean Point according to the Manatee County Sheriff’s Office.

item.title: NASA astronaut captures rare red aurora from space
item.description: An astronaut captured a rare light show from space.

item.title: St. Armands parking availability ‘just fine’ merchants say
item.description: For shop owners on the key, it’s critical; parking is crucial, they say, to keeping the lights on.

item.title: College student pleads not guilty after dead infant found in trash bag inside closet, police say
item.description: A University of Kentucky senior charged in connection with the death of her infant made her first appearance in court on Tuesday.

item.title: Disney to pay $10 million fine after FTC says it allowed data collection on kids
item.description: The Walt Disney Co. will pay a $10 million fine to settle a Federal Trade Commission lawsuit alleging it allowed personal data to be collected on kids under 13, violating federal law.

item.title: Florida will work to eliminate all childhood vaccine mandates, officials say
item.description: State Surgeon General Dr. Joseph Ladapo cast current requirements as an 'immoral' intrusion on people’s rights bordering on 'slavery.'

item.title: Boy bitten by shark in Key Largo recovering after surgery, family says
item.description: Richard Burrows was bitten by a blacktip shark Monday afternoon while snorkeling with his family.

item.title: Donna Adelson decides not to testify in her murder trial, defense rests
item.description: The question of whether Adelson was to testify hung over the entirety of the trial, now in its third week.

item.title: Rain chances will go up on Thursday
item.description: Rain chances will go up in the days to come
